sen.j: 澤村 訥升（さわむら とっしょう）は、歌舞伎役者。
sen.e: Tossho SAWAMURA was a kabuki actor.
Tossho SAWAMURA was a name used by Kabuki actors.
sen.cmt: 特定の人物ではなく、歌舞伎役者が使用する名前であることがわかるよう訳し直しました。
sen.e: Tossho SAWAMURA was a name used by Kabuki actors.

sen.j: 屋号は紀伊國屋_(歌舞伎)。
sen.e: His stage family name was Kinokuniya.
The stage family name used by Tossho SAWAMURA was Kinokuniya.
sen.cmt: 一部訳文を修正しました。
sen.e: The stage family name used by Tossho SAWAMURA was Kinokuniya.

sen.j: 定紋は丸にいの字。
sen.e: Jomon, (family crest) was a letter, "い", in a circle.
Jomon, (family crest) was a letter, "い," in a circle.
sen.cmt: クォーテーションの位置を移動
sen.e: Jomon, (family crest) was a letter, "い," in a circle.

sen.j: 初代 澤村訥升
sen.e: Tossho SAWAMURA the first
Tossho SAWAMURA the First
Tossho SAWAMURA the First

sen.j: 澤村宗十郎(５代目)の俳名。
sen.e: Tossho SAWAMURA was haimyo (a kabuki actor's offstage name which can be used officially and privately) of Sojuro SAWAMURA the fifth.
Tossho SAWAMURA was haimyo (a Kabuki actor's offstage name which can be used officially and privately) of Sojuro SAWAMURA the Fifth.
sen.cmt: Kabukiとし、余分なスペース消去、the Fifthとしました。
sen.e: Tossho SAWAMURA was haimyo (a Kabuki actor's offstage name which can be used officially and privately) of Sojuro SAWAMURA the Fifth.

sen.j: 澤村宗十郎 (4代目)の門弟。
sen.e: He was a apprentice of Sojuro SAWAMURA the fourth.
He was an apprentice of Sojuro SAWAMURA the Fourth.
sen.cmt: a apprentice→an apprenticeに修正、the Fourthとしました。
sen.e: He was an apprentice of Sojuro SAWAMURA the Fourth.

sen.j: 他の俳名は、澤村訥子、高賀。
sen.e: His other haimyo were Tosshi SAWAMURA and Koga.
His other haimyo were Tosshi SAWAMURA and Koga.
His other haimyo were Tosshi SAWAMURA and Koga.

sen.j: 市村座の芝居茶屋泉屋の出方浜崎長吉の子。
sen.e: He was a son of 浜崎長吉, an attendant of Shibai jaya (A tea house (chaya) located within a theater) called Izumi-ya in Ichimura-za Theater.
He was a son of Chokichi HAMASAKI (浜崎長吉), an attendant of Shibai jaya (A tea house (chaya) located within a theater) called Izumi-ya in Ichimura-za Theater.
sen.cmt: 浜崎長吉→Chokichi HAMASAKI (浜崎長吉)としました。
sen.e: He was a son of Chokichi HAMASAKI (浜崎長吉), an attendant of Shibai jaya (A tea house (chaya) located within a theater) called Izumi-ya in Ichimura-za Theater.

sen.j: 和実を本領とし、女形も兼ねた。
sen.e: He was good at wajitsu (a subtle mix of wagotoshi and jitsugotoshi) and he doubled as actor of female roles.
He was good at wajitsu (a subtle mix of wagotoshi and jitsugotoshi) and he doubled as actor of female roles.
He was good at wajitsu (a subtle mix of wagotoshi and jitsugotoshi) and he doubled as actor of female roles.

sen.j: 澤村訥升 (2代目)
sen.e: Tossho SAWAMURA the second.
Tossho SAWAMURA the Second
sen.cmt: the Secondとし、ピリオド削除
sen.e: Tossho SAWAMURA the Second

sen.j: - 5代目澤村宗十郎の長男、実の弟は澤村田之助 (3代目)。
sen.e: He was the first son of Sojuro SAWAMURA the fifth, and his younger brother by blood was Tanosuke SAWAMURA the third.
He was the first son of Sojuro SAWAMURA the Fifth, and his younger brother by blood was Tanosuke SAWAMURA the Third.
He was the first son of Sojuro SAWAMURA the Fifth, and his younger brother by blood was Tanosuke SAWAMURA the Third.

sen.j: 6代目宗十郎を数えるが襲名間近の名古屋での出演中に倒れた為追贈される。
sen.e: Although he was counted as Tossho SAWAMURA the sixth, he fell unconscious and died during the performance in Nagoya just before succession to his predecessor's name, therefore, succession name was conferred on him after his death.

Although he was counted as Tossho SAWAMURA the Sixth, he fell unconscious and died during the performance in Nagoya just before succession to his predecessor's name, therefore, succession name was conferred on him after his death.
sen.cmt: the Sixthとし、余分なスペース消去
sen.e: Although he was counted as Tossho SAWAMURA the Sixth, he fell unconscious and died during the performance in Nagoya just before succession to his predecessor's name, therefore, succession name was conferred on him after his death.

sen.j: 俳名は訥升、訥子、高賀。
sen.e: His haimyo was Tossho, Tosshi, and Koga.
His haimyo were Tossho, Tosshi, and Koga.
His haimyo were Tossho, Tosshi, and Koga.

sen.j: 3代目 澤村訥升
sen.e: Tossho SAWAMURA the third.
Tossho SAWAMURA the Third
sen.cmt: the Thirdとし、ピリオド削除
sen.e: Tossho SAWAMURA the Third

sen.j: - 後の澤村宗十郎 (7代目)、2代目澤村訥升の養子。
sen.e: Later, he became Sojuro SAWAMURA the seventh and an adopted child of Tossho SAWAMURA the second.
Later, he became Sojuro SAWAMURA the Seventh and an adopted child of Tossho SAWAMURA the Second.
Later, he became Sojuro SAWAMURA the Seventh and an adopted child of Tossho SAWAMURA the Second.

sen.j: 俳名は高賀。
sen.e: His haimyo was Koga.
His haimyo was Koga.
His haimyo was Koga.

sen.j: 4代目 澤村訥升
sen.e: Tossho SAWAMURA the fourth.
Tossho SAWAMURA the Fourth
sen.cmt: the Fourthとし、ピリオド削除
sen.e: Tossho SAWAMURA the Fourth

sen.j: - 後の澤村宗十郎 (8代目)、7代目澤村宗十郎の三男。
sen.e: Later, he became Sojuro SAWAMURA the eighth, and he was the third child of Sojuro SAWAMURA the seventh.
Later, he became Sojuro SAWAMURA the Eighth, and he was the third child of Sojuro SAWAMURA the Seventh.
Later, he became Sojuro SAWAMURA the Eighth, and he was the third child of Sojuro SAWAMURA the Seventh.

sen.j: 俳名は高賀、東輝。
sen.e: His Haimyo was Koga and Toki.
His Haimyo were Koga and Toki.
His Haimyo were Koga and Toki.

sen.j: 5代目 澤村訥升
sen.e: Tossho SAWAMURA the fifth.
Tossho SAWAMURA the Fifth
sen.cmt: the Fifthとし、ピリオド削除
sen.e: Tossho SAWAMURA the Fifth

sen.j: - 後の澤村宗十郎 (9代目)、8代目澤村宗十郎の長男。
sen.e: Later, he became Sojuro SAWAMURA the ninth, and he was the first son of Sojuro SAWAMURA the 8th.
Later, he became Sojuro SAWAMURA the Ninth, and he was the first son of Sojuro SAWAMURA the Eighth.
Later, he became Sojuro SAWAMURA the Ninth, and he was the first son of Sojuro SAWAMURA the Eighth.
